document.full_text: the toronto maple leafs beat the carolina hurricanes 3-1 on wednesday to keep the hurricanes from moving into a tie for the final playoff spot in the eastern conference.
document.title: toronto check carolina in tight east playoff race
lines_and_colors: the toronto maple leafs beat the carolina hurricanes 3-1 on wednesday to keep the hurricanes from moving into a tie for the final playoff spot in the eastern conference.
